mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectMbrSecsnCrtfc Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ MBR_NO , MBR_CRTFC_TURN , MBR_CRTFC_TP_CD , MBR_CRTFC_YN , MBR_CRTFC_DATE , RLNM_CRTFC_RESULT_CD , RLNM_CRTFC_DI , RLNM_CRTFC_CI , RLNM_CRTFC_VER , RLNM_CRTFC_IPIN , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM MBR_SECSN_CRTFC WHERE 1 = 1 AND MBR_NO = #{mbrNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND MBR_CRTFC_TURN = #{mbrCrtfcTurn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
